description: Don't want your members to send out links? Here you can forbid it
usage: {emotes.use} | Use {prefix}automod on | off [channel] | ignoreurl add/remove <url> / list
usageHelp: automod on | off [channel] | ignoreurl add/remove <url> / list
activate: {emotes.success} | Any links will be automatically deleted from now on
autoModIsNotEnabled: {emotes.error} | Automod must be enabled before you can ignore URLs
added: {emotes.success} | {url} will be ignored from now on
